messages.title: Expenses scandal - my pledge to you
messages.content: We all hear a lot about restoring confidence in politicians. Well, the only way to do that is for each candidate in the General Election to be open and honest and to make firm 'up front' pledges of how they would act if elected. So here are mine.

messages.title: Labour and the Conservatives won't deliver change and fairness
messages.content: Decades of Labour and Conservative governments haven't delivered real change in Britain. After thirteen years, it's clear that Labour has failed on the economy, on climate change, on civil liberties and even on tackling poverty. They've lost touch with real life in Britain. But a Conservative government won't change anything for the better. Everyone remembers the damage they did when they were last in power. Today's Conservatives haven't changed at all.

messages.title: Our NHS, our economy and our environment will not be safe in Tory hands.
The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Lib Dems will take action to protect vital frontline NHS services. We will put more police on patrol, restore the pensioners' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces. We can make this pledge because we have identified real savings to pay for it. The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise the tax threshold so the first £10,000 you earn - cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more money into schools and abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair start for people with the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.economy: Labour has failed on the economy...The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.
issues.education: Smaller class sizes, more money into schools and abolish university tuition fees.
issues.environment: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will take action to protect vital frontline NHS services.

leaflet.personalStatement: We all hear a lot about restoring confidence in politicians.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet suggests that a Conservative government will not be safe for the NHS, economy, or the environment.
